raw_body: BERHARDT (JUNE) MARIE THOMAZINE (nee LUDOWYK) – Dearly beloved wife of John Maurice,​ loving mother of Horace,​ Steuart,​ Jerome (all of Australia),​ Sherlock and Veron,​ mother-in-law of Romaine,​ Perin (Australia),​ Tracy and Delika,​ beloved grandmother of Kirk,​ Amanda,​ Dexter,​ Derick,​ Josh,​ Jadin,​ Natalie,​ Sherwyn,​ Trent and Delvin,​ passed away peacefully on 10th October 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour from 9.00 a.m. to 10.00 p.m. on Friday,​ the 13th. Cortege leaves parlour at 4.00 p.m. on Saturday,​ 14th October for burial at the General Cemetery,​ Borella,​ Roman Catholic Section.065378
